Welcome to the world
of connected objects

The oToDo’s hub automatically connects your internet box with all objects at home.

With the oToDo’s hub

The missing link between your internet provider box and all your home objects
MANAGE ALL HOME OBJECTS
INTUITIVE HANDLING
ABSOLUTE SECURITY

Manage all home objects

All objects become connected

The oToDo’s hub allows you to manage many commercial connected objects, but also older remote controlled devices (sliding shutters, lamps, plugs, thermostats, etc)

Learn more

Intuitive handling

Immediately ready for use!

Handling the oToDo’s Hub is effortless from your smartphone, tablet & computer. As soon as it is switched on, no complex configuration is needed, the system is tailored to your specific needs.

Learn more

Absolute security

In secure manner

The oToDo’s hub is built to resist any hacker attack, & offer a private mode to any user that would like to protect the hub from all external networks outside the home.

Learn more

The hub of your connected home

Heater

Are you already using a heater connected to your thermostat ? By just connecting it to your oToDo account you’ll be able to access all your thermostat setting in one place.

Lighting

Either you already have connected or simply remoted controlled devices, the oToDo’s hub will manage most of smart lightings existing on the market.

Camera

Secure your home or activate predefined events by linking in no time your camera with the oToDo app.

Sliding shutter

The oToDo Hub is compatible with most of controllable devices / smart devices by radio wave. No need of remote control anymore; you manage effortlessly the opening or closure of your shutter or electrical portal directly from the app.

And always more

You add/buy new objects, the family grows or you’re planning to lend your house ? oToDo’s solution will evolve every day to take into account the added smart devices and centralised information and the management of your smart home.

SMART HOME MADE EASY

Multiple actions program allows you to act on objects without any complicated configuration of scenario.

Surveillance lets you follow in one screen every data of your captors (such as temperature, presence of people or not, or every other surveillance that you would like to program).

Comfort lets you manage your energy systems remotely directly from your app.

When you arrive at home, oToDo opens automatically your portal.

When you leave your home, close your shutters in one click.

Your water, energy, gaz consumption is excessive, oToDo notifies you.

ABSOLUTE SECURITY

Securing exchanges, all data & exchanges are encrypted

Anti-intrusion protections

Notifications alert the user of any unusual event

Private mode

To ensure the highest level of protection to our customers, we regularly realize external audits of our infrastructures.

Our story

  • Spring 2016

    Beginning of the adventure

    Eric is convinced that internet boxes will not only connect phones & tablets but also allow us to control remotely objects at home. He envisions a “hub” very simple to use that will do the link & decide to launch the company oToDo.
  • JUIN 2016

    Demonstrations

    The 1st team (Eric, Eric, Alexandre & Laurent) works on the Hub’s first version (a cube). A show flat is used to run demonstrations of the first working model of the system.
  • Sept. - Oct. 2016

    The Prototype

    The hub adopts a round design & its prototype version is equipped with a new more powerful processor. The iOs smartphone app is created and the first full-scale tests start.
  • Nov. - Dec. 2016

    Field tests

    Four new protocols are integrated in the hub for covering a wide range of objects. A services platform for adding new objects is designed to let manufacturing partners directly enrich and update the system.

  • JOIN US!

    Pre-serie materials will be soon available to let you do try the Hub at home. So JOIN US !
